Study participant postmenopausal woman document mean value 7 flushes/24 hour use HRT prescribed medication may influence climacteric complaint . The treatment group receive 10 session TCM acupuncture-care self-care ; control group engage self-care . The duration intervention period 12 week evaluation baseline , 4 , 8 , 12 week , follow 6 12 month baseline . Primary endpoint change daily hot flush frequency two group baseline 12 week ; secondary endpoint health relate quality life . N treatment group : 143 ( 286 altogether ) .
